comments:
In Key preference page, select "modify " tab, the "name" combo under "key 
sequence" has a wrong arrow direction, and the items can't be selected 
correctly
Could you please explain a bit more?

Created an attachment (id=19405)
a screenshot for  keyPreferencePage

see my attachment please

under "modify" tab of keyPreferencePage, in "key sequence" table, try to 
select item from comboCommand beside label "Name", it will cause an error:

Unhandled event loop exception
Reason:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

Could you explain a bit more?  The screenshot is marked as "text/html", but it
appears to be some kind of binary file.  What file type is it?  Also, if I
select an item from the "Command" group's "Name" combo box, I do not see this
exception.  Are you selecting a particular item?  Which "Category" do you have
selected when you do this?  Could you give more detailed steps?

To trigger the exception, you need to add two special keys in a row.

The exception is:
